metro.WindowControls

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
      • metro.WindowControls.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlElement

    public class Button
extends ActionObservable
implements ControlElement
    A button with text ot an image attached to a window. It also manages the click-event.
    Author:
    hauke

    • Method Detail

      • isPressed

        public boolean isPressed(int x,
                int y)
        Checks if the mouse is in the button area or has been clicked a while ago.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of mouse.
        y - y-coordinate of mouse.
        Returns:
        True if mouse is in area or Button has been pressed.

      • isPressed

        public boolean isPressed()
        Returns if the button has been clicked since last frame.
        Returns:
        True is button has been pressed.

      • clickOnControlElement

        public boolean clickOnControlElement()
        Check if mouse is on the button and sets its clicked-flag to true (isPressed() would return true now).
        Returns:
        boolean True when user clicked on control, false when not.
